statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x , 3 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 5 \, x - 4 , 15 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} - 16 \, x - 8 , 6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 7 \, x - 4 , 5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
